name: nuclide-notifications
description: Provides native notification support for Nuclide & Atom

success.title: Native success notifications
success.description: Send 'success' notifications to the operating system.

info.title: Native info notifications
info.description: Send 'info' notifications to the operating system.

warning.title: Native warning notifications
warning.description: Send 'warning' notifications to the operating system.

error.title: Native error notifications
error.description: Send 'error' notifications to the operating system.

fatal.title: Native fatal notifications
fatal.description: Send 'fatal' notifications to the operating system.
